Constructor Detail

DBLockInfo

public DBLockInfo()
Creates a new, empty DBLockInfo object.

DBLockInfo

public DBLockInfo(int theFlags,
                  int theMode,
                  Handle theHandle,
                  java.lang.String theTransactionId)
Creates a new, empty DBLockInfo object with the specified parameters.

Parameters:
theFlags - Additional lock info.
theMode - The lock mode of the locked object.
theHandle - The Handle to the object being locked.
theTransactionId - The unique transaction id of the transaction in which the lock was acquired.

Valid values for theFlags are: LOCK_INFO_RUNNING, LOCK_INFO_WAITING, LOCK_INFO_TRANSIENT or LOCK_INFO_PERSISTENT.
